node.title: Court only avenue for alleged victims to prove claims against nurse James Griffin
node.alt: James Griffin deceased Launceston paedophile nurse.
node.description: The Tasmanian Health Service has not admitted to the abuse by Launceston nurse James Griffin claimed by the three plaintiffs, as court documents detail new information about concerns raised at the hospital about his conduct.
node.content:
["Two women and a teenager suing the Tasmanian Health Service (THS) for alleged abuse by paediatric nurse James Geoffrey Griffin will have to prove their allegations\u00a0in court after the health service said it did not agree with claims any of them had been abused by Griffin.", "The THS has filed defences in the Supreme Court in three cases against it relating to Griffin.", "The allegations include abuse at the Launceston General Hospital (LGH)\u00a0where the then-teenagers were patients at various times from 2015-2018, and on sleepovers and camping trips hosted by Griffin.", "The three plaintiffs have alleged they were groomed and abused by Griffin, and that he used his position at the hospital to gain the plaintiffs' trust.", "They claimed the THS breached its duty of care and that its failure to monitor activities at the hospital, as well as its handling of complaints, constituted gross negligence.", "In its defences, the THS said in relation to each case that it \"does not admit that the plaintiff was subject to abuse or that Griffin was acting as the defendant's servant or agent in committing any abuse\".", "It also said in one of the defences that Griffin was \"not acting as its servant or agent when abusing the plaintiff at his houses, whilst the Plaintiff was camping with Griffin or whilst the plaintiff was staying with Griffin at ... [a]\u00a0motel or go-karting with Griffin\".", "The THS is also relying on the limitations period, which restricts the amount of time someone has to make an allegation of abuse that is not sexual, in relation to any abuse allegations not characterised as sexual abuse or related to sexual abuse.", "Griffin worked as a paediatric nurse at the LGH\u00a0between 2009 and 2019. He was a registered nurse for 19 years.", "In October 2019, he was charged with multiple child sex offences, but died by suicide before facing court.", "An internal review of how Tasmania Police handled its investigation into allegations against Griffin found police received information about potential child abuse in relation to Griffin in 2009, 2011, 2013 and 2015.", "", "
Griffin worked at the Launceston General Hospital for 10 years.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "The defences filed in relation to the three civil cases revealed further details about concerns raised at the LGH about Griffin.", "The documents listed eight instances:", "The defences said that\u00a0complaints that were made were responded to.", "The plaintiffs said they, or family members, raised concerns or complained about Griffin. Those claims have not been admitted by the THS.", "
Case sparked wider probe
", "Allegations made against Griffin prompted the Tasmanian government to launch an independent investigation in October last year.", "Then Health Minister Sarah Courtney apologised to \"any victim both now and in the past\".", "The allegations against Griffin, as well as complaints about sexual abuse in public schools and the Ashley Youth Detention Centre, led to the state government setting up the Commission of Inquiry into the Tasmanian Government's Responses to Child Sexual Abuse, which held an opening hearing in October.", "At that hearing, counsel assisting the commission, Maree Norton, said how complaints were handled by the Launceston General Hospital would be a \"key area of inquiry\".", "\"Questions regarding the adequacy of the LGH's response to complaints of child sexual abuse do not appear to be limited to those involving Mr Griffin,\" she said.", "\"The commission has already learned of other children who may have made complaints against other staff members at the LGH and whose complaints may have been ignored or not dealt with appropriately.\"", "A court date for the three civil cases against the THS has not yet been set."]
